p: These problems are recognised by the Government of Kiribati in published reports [ 15, 35, 42, 43, 52]. Other international reports also point to enforcement difficulties in the region where problems such as overfishing or misuse of resources are concerned. Campbell and Hanich highlight this problem in fisheries development in Kiribati [ 34]. Others strongly emphasise the urgent need to address the food security problems in Kiribati while also recognising the limited capacity of the Government of Kiribati [ 33, 36, 38, 44].
